npc2place.themeHint: Determines the graphic style applied to the sheets (sci-fi or medieval).

styleActif.name: Sheet visual theme
styleActif.hint: Choose a display style for Planet and Location sheets.

listeTypesLieux.name: Types of locations
listeTypesLieux.hint: List of types (e.g. City, Military base...) separated by semicolons

listeTaillesLieux.name: Location sizes
listeTaillesLieux.hint: List of sizes (e.g. Small, Medium...) separated by semicolons

listeGouvernances.name: Types of governance
listeGouvernances.hint: List of governance types (e.g. Local council...) separated by semicolons

listeSituationsGeo.name: Geographical situations
listeSituationsGeo.hint: List of terrain or environment types separated by semicolons

listeActivites.name: Main activities of locations
listeActivites.hint: List of possible activities, separated by semicolons

npc2place.listeAffiliationsDefault: Galactic Union;Coalition of Non-Aligned Worlds;Cosmic Brotherhood;Private Company;Independent
npc2place.listeTypesLieuxDefault: City;Military base;Research center;Mining outpost;Climate station;Diplomatic zone;Temple;University;Spaceport;Historical site;Colony;Secret base;Refurbished wreck;Agricultural dome;Nomadic camp;Cryo-complex;Medical center;Prison;Orbital platform;Commercial district;Station
npc2place.listeGouvernancesDefault: Local council;Military authority;Artificial intelligence;Central government;Native tribe;Private company;Single ruler;Democratic system;Religious organization;None
npc2place.listeInfrastructuresDefault: Spaceport;Control tower;Laboratory;Agricultural dome;Medical station;Communication center;Hangar;Bunker;Solar panels

ressources.dropHint: Drop a resource (consumable or miscellaneous item) here to add it to this planet

lieux.dropHint: Drop an NPC here to link it to this planet

planet.dropSpecies: Drop an NPC sheet here to add it as a dominant species
